messages.content: What is ComfyUI-EasyOCR?
ComfyUI-EasyOCR is a node in ComfyUI that uses Easy-OCR to implement OCR text recognition functionality.
What is the main purpose of the Apply EasyOCR node?
The main purpose of the Apply EasyOCR node is to use the OCR model for text recognition, and the model will be automatically downloaded.
What are the dependencies required to install ComfyUI-EasyOCR?
To install ComfyUI-EasyOCR, you need to install the 'easyocr' Python package using the command 'pip install easyocr'.
How does ComfyUI-EasyOCR handle different languages?
ComfyUI-EasyOCR automatically downloads the corresponding model based on the language selected by the user.
Where are the models for ComfyUI-EasyOCR stored?
The models for ComfyUI-EasyOCR are stored in the 'ComfyUI/models/EasyOCR' directory, with examples being 'latin_g2.pth', 'zh_sim_g2.pth', and 'craft_mlt_25k.pth'.
Is the EasyOCR model automatically downloaded when using the Apply EasyOCR node?
Yes, when using the Apply EasyOCR node, the EasyOCR model will be automatically downloaded.
Does ComfyUI-EasyOCR support multiple languages?
Yes, ComfyUI-EasyOCR supports multiple languages by automatically downloading the corresponding model based on the selected language.
ComfyUI-EasyOCR节点的主要功能是什么？
ComfyUI-EasyOCR节点主要基于Easy-OCR，实现OCR文本识别功能。
要使用ComfyUI-EasyOCR节点，需要安装哪个Python包？
要使用ComfyUI-EasyOCR节点，需要安装easyocr包，安装命令为：pip install easyocr。
ComfyUI-EasyOCR节点会自动下载哪些模型？
ComfyUI-EasyOCR节点会根据选择的语言，自动下载对应的模型，如latin_g2.pth、zh_sim_g2.pth和craft_mlt_25k.pth等。
默认的EasyOCR节点名称是什么？
默认的EasyOCR节点名称为'Apply EasyOCR'，它使用OCR模型，自动下载模型。
ComfyUI-EasyOCR节点的工作流程示例图在哪里可以找到？
ComfyUI-EasyOCR节点的工作流程示例图可以在/docs/workflow.png中找到。
ComfyUI-EasyOCR节点支持哪些语言的文档？
ComfyUI-EasyOCR节点的文档支持英文和简体中文两种语言。
下载的EasyOCR模型会存储在什么路径下？
下载的EasyOCR模型会存储在ComfyUI/models/EasyOCR/目录下。
